com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget
Class Layout

java.lang.Object
  com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.Layout
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnchorLayout, BorderLayout, CardLayout, ColumnLayout, FillLayout, FitLayout, FlowLayout, RowLayout, TableLayout
public abstract class Layout
extends java.lang.Object

Layout provides the basic foundation for all other layout classes in GXT. It is a non-visual class that simply provides the base logic required to function as a layout. This class is intended to be extended.

See Also:
Container

Field Detail

extraStyle

public java.lang.String extraStyle
An optional extra CSS style name that will be added to the container (defaults to null). This can be useful for adding customized styles to the container or any of its children using standard CSS rules.

renderHidden

public boolean renderHidden
True to hide each contained item on render (defaults to false).

monitorWindowResize

public boolean monitorWindowResize
True to execute this layout when the browser window is resized (defaults to false). This is usefull when a container is isolated and not part of the container hierarchy.

resizeDelay

public int resizeDelay
The number of milliseconds to buffer resize events (defaults to 400). Only applies when monitorWindowResize = true.
